GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

reviews.title: Reef
reviews.review_body: This game reminds me of the stress-free environment described in a song sung by a crab in the famous film about a mermaid. Plenty of coral collecting, and reef building to keep you entertained

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a review object with the specified review id

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: increases the number of votes of the review object with the specified review id by the number on the inc_votes property on the object sent (decreases the number of votes if sent a negative number)

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the specifed review id

comments.author: jessjelly
comments.body: Quis duis mollit ad enim deserunt.

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: inserts a new comment into the comment table with the specified review id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment with the specified comment id, returns an empty body
